template.name: Template Cisco Environment SNMP
template.description:
Template relacionado ao comando "show environment".
Mostra informações de temperatura, tensão, fan e fonte de alimentação.
Baseado no template https://github.com/jjmartres/Zabbix/tree/master/zbx-templates/zbx-cisco/zbx-cisco-envmon

item.name: Used CPU for the last 5 minutes
Unused memory for the last 5 minutes
Used memory for the last 5 minutes

trigger_prototype.name: Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is CRITICAL
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is FAILED
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} is WARNING
Operational status for sensor {#SNMPVALUE} was changed

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoCpmCPUTotal5minRev.avg(600)}>50 and {Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoCpmCPUTotal5minRev.avg(600)}<60
trigger.name: CPU usage exceeded 50%

trigger.expression: {Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoCpmCPUTotal5minRev.avg(600)}>60 and {Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoCpmCPUTotal5minRev.avg(600)}<80
trigger.name: CPU usage exceeded 60%

trigger.expression: ({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})>0.6*({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)}) and ({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})<0.7*({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})
trigger.name: Memory usage exceeded 60%

trigger.expression: ({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})>0.7*({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)}) and ({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})<0.8*({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})
trigger.name: Memory usage exceeded 70%

trigger.expression: ({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})>0.8*({Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolFree.avg(600)}+{Template Cisco Environment SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed.avg(600)})
trigger.name: Memory usage exceeded 80%
